title: Heat Wave In Canada Sparks Wildfires Across British Columbia
content:
1. Heat Wave In Canada Sparks Wildfires Across British Columbia  NPR
  2. Canada Lytton: Wildfire forces hottest place in heatwave to evacuate  BBC News
  3. Wildfire forces evacuation of residents in small western Canada town  Reuters
  4. Wildfire leads to evacuation order in B.C. village that set Canadian heat wave record  Vancouver Is Awesome
  5. An entire Canadian town is up in flames after temperatures soared to a record-breaking 121 degrees Fahrenheit  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
